song_lyrics: Yogī yuge yuge padhārī jīvonu kalyāṇ karo... °ṭek
Gītānā gānārā Giridhar, janma sufaḷ am āj karo,
Janma-maraṇnā ferā miṭāvī, bhavsāgarthī pār karo... Yogī° 1
Manuṣhyajīvan safaḷ karyu chhe tav darshannī sange,
Hār jītnā khel mīṭyā chhe premmilannā range... Yogī° 2
Rāmkṛuṣhṇa sam yug puruṣh chho sarve sukhnā denārā chho,
Jagne shānti āpī āje jagad‍guru kahevāyā chho... Yogī° 3
title: Yogī yuge yuge padhārī jīvonu kalyāṇ karo

metadata.kirtan_info:
2-129: unknown

Category: Yogiji Maharajna Pad
